title: Need help to ID "Fragiles" / Porcelain Font
content:
Need help to ID the font in FRAGILES.  
Thanks...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011042319im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Fragiles_3486.jpg)

 [‹ New York Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011042319/http:/typophile.com/node/42390 "Go to previous forum topic") [What am I putting in my mouth? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011042319/http:/typophile.com/node/42381 "Go to next forum topic")
author: robotrock

comments.content: No no, it’s a truth revival of Didot.

It’s a modified boldoni/didot of some kind. Maybe Hoefler’s because the serifs are very thin and the tear drop top of the f looks familiar. definitely customized though.

BTW - I deleted the other duplicate post.

So you don´t think I can find the font just like that? The same font?

Thanks for your help anyway.
I doubt it very very much.
